raw_comment:
The first thing I notice is that the percentage of young adults that visit their parents at least once a week was much higher than I expected. I did not expect that around a quarter of all young adults visit in person on a weekly basis because this would mean that around that number live in close enough vicinity to visit frequently. I wonder why the difference between men and women seem about the same for texts and video-chats but the difference is not very wide for visits in person. 
This is related to me because I fit the age demographic and don't live with my parents; since I'm a college student the people around me also fit these categories.
Title: "How often do Young Adults Contact their Parents?"
ace_sentences: The percentage of young adults that visit their parents at least once a week is much higher than I expected.
I did not expect another fact.
Around a quarter of all young adults visit their parents in person once a week.
If around a quarter of all young adults visit their parents in person once a week then around a quarter of all young adults live close enough to visit frequently.
The difference between men and women seems about the same for texts and video-chats.
The difference between men and women is not very wide for visits in person.
This comment is related to me.
I fit the age demographic of young adults.
I do not live with my parents.
The people around me fit these categories.
The title is "How often do Young Adults Contact their Parents?".
